Package org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi

Provides classes and interfaces for integrating a Grizzly-based Jersey-compliant HTTP container into CDI.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Producers
    A class housing producer methods that manufacture certain Grizzly- and Jersey-related objects, including HttpServer instances (by way of GrizzlyHttpServerFactory instances) and GrizzlyHttpContainer instances (by way of ContainerFactory instances).

Package org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi Description

Provides classes and interfaces for integrating a Grizzly-based Jersey-compliant HTTP container into CDI.
Author:
Laird Nelson
